messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] (unknown)/Melanie
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Melanie - No they sent me the Guidelines for Home Study in Vermont. I didn t get a resource guide. I will call & ask for that one tomorrow. thanks Ellen
messages.messageBody:
Hi Melanie - No they sent me the Guidelines for Home Study in Vermont. I didn't get a resource guide. I will call & ask for that one tomorrow.
thanks
Ellen

Melanie Ilsley <us5@...> wrote:
Ellen did you get this from the state? Did you get the Vermont Home Study Resouce Guide ?
It has examples of many different styles of approaches. I got mine by calling the home
study program and requesting a packet.(802)8283352. I will look on line for it, and if i find it
i will post it for you.Melanie

messages.messageBody:
Ellen did you get this from the state? Did you get the Vermont Home Study Resouce Guide ?
It has examples of many different styles of approaches. I got mine by calling the home
study program and requesting a packet.(802)8283352. I will look on line for it, and if i find it
i will post it for you.Melanie
